author: James Tanner
method: Place the vinegar and olive oil together in a bowl and whisk together. Pour the dressing over the spinach leaves and red pepper and mix together to coat well. To serve, place the salad into a clean bowl and sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Crumble the dolcelatte over the top and serve.
ingredients: 1 tsp white wine vinegar,  2 tsp olive oil,  140g/5oz baby spinach leaves,  1 roasted red pepper from a jar, drained and sliced,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  55g/2oz dolcelatte
